name: Diana GIOVAGNOLI, Petitioner, v. STATE CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION (Monroe County Children and Youth Services), Respondents
name_abbreviation: Giovagnoli v. State Civil Service Commission

parties: Diana GIOVAGNOLI, Petitioner, v. STATE CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION (Monroe County Children and Youth Services), Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of March, 2004, the Petitions for Allowance of Appeal are hereby granted, limited to the following issue:
Whether Petitioner’s petition for review, lodged in the Commonwealth Court from the State Civil Service Commission’s order denying the award of attorney fees, should be converted into a petition for leave to appeal?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
846 A.2d 74
Diana GIOVAGNOLI, Petitioner, v. STATE CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION (Monroe County Children and Youth Services), Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 3, 2004.
